game.title: The Dragon's Lair
game.objective: Defeat the powerful dragon in its lair.
game.description: Your mission is to travel to the northern mountains, infiltrate the dragon's lair, and defeat the beast to protect the kingdom.
game.reward: The King's gratitude and 5000 gold coins.

task.description: Travel to the Northern Mountains, pack your gear, and prepare for battle against the dragon.
Locate and sneak into the dragon's lair, being cautious of traps and minions.
Conquer the dragon in its lair with all your strength and weapons.
